content:
Identify the intents and entities in the phrase below. Do not pull entities from other intents not found within the phrase.  Your entire response should be in JSON.

Phrase: Dear Norman, I only have two more tasks left for this reservation. I still need your equipment needs - ex: do you need a microphone? I also need to know how many people will be attending so I can book your catering appropriately. Sincerely, Jane Brown

Intent ID | Description | Entities
GAD583 | Book necessary equipment at your event. This can be done through the event space or a third party. This does not include equipment you already own. | Name of Equipment, Budget, Rental Company, Time, Date, Location, Quantity
NAQ027 | Research and book a caterer for your event. | Name of Caterer, Date, Time, Location, Type of Food, Number of People
PLN290 | Decorate the space for your event. | Materials, Budget, Decoration Company, Quantity
WEN654 | Research and book potential venues for your event in your desired location on desired date | City, State, Country, Capacity, Amenities
BVC364 | Research and book entertainment for your event. | Name of band/DJ/Magician/etc, Date, Time, Location, Budget, Genre, Instruments, Equipment for Entertainment
WOM014 | Send invitations to the invited attendees for your event. | Material - card/envelope/email, Number, Color, Design
